title: Gabbeh
creator_credit: Mohsen Makhmalbaf, Khalil Mahmoudi, Khalil Daroudchi, MK2 Productions and Sanayeh Dasti
brief_description: With “Gabbeh” Mohsen Makhmalbaf creates a romantic parable of universal resonance. A gabbeh is an Iranian carpet produced by the nomadic Ghashghai tribe of southern Iran. This episodic tale is framed with exquisite interludes on the colours of nature, painting each scene with landscapes and vistas of breathtaking beauty.
creator_credit_for_label: Mohsen Makhmalbaf, Khalil Mahmoudi, Khalil Daroudchi, MK2 Productions and Sanayeh Dasti
